pages.text: There's lots of dimensions this datapack adds, so I'll be short with my descriptions here. To access a dimension, hold an Amethyst in your offhand, a specific item of choice in your mainhand, and stand on a Netherite Block and boom, you're there!

pages.title: Malicious Dark Forest
pages.text: What a horrid place to find yourself in...This place is constantly dark, os mobs will find you quite a treat to find here...The item of choice is a Wither Skull

pages.title: Depressed Badlands
pages.text: What a dreary place to be...Honestly, the Dark Forest was happier. At least there were things to interact with...To get here, use Dead Brain Coral...

pages.title: Paranoid End Highlands
pages.text: This one is a bit of a freaky one. It'd make even me paranoid...but basically to get there you'll need to pay up w/ your Totem of Undying

pages.title: Enraged Nether Wastes
pages.text: A Hellish landscape indeed, pretty much anger in manifestation. You'll want a Damaged Anvil to get here.

pages.title: Curious Overworld
pages.text: A bit of an odd one this is, it's similar to the Overworld, but its....floating...? To get here, use a Command Block

pages.title: Peacful Flower Forest
pages.text: As the name suggests, its very peaceful here and no mobs spawn, just fluffy and harmless beasts. Use a Written Book to get here.

pages.title: Honest Plains
pages.text: Just as it sounds, an honest plains area...but it floats...All the same, everything here biome-wise is unchanged. Get here with a honey bottle in hand

pages.title: Controlled Overworld
pages.text: A pretty expensive way to get here, requiring one End Crystal just for a one-way trip there. It may not be as controlling as it sounds, but it's definitely not a fun place to be.

pages.title: Light Overworld
pages.text: What can I say, a dimension that has no corruption. It's as if going here washes away all corruption and sin. Getting herer requires the fabled Notch Apple, though

pages.title: Drunken Ocean
pages.text: What more is there to say? An ocean of beer...how delightful...getting here requires a potion, any will do

pages.title: Insane End Barrens
pages.text: I cannot deny the state of this place, it makes me want to slap Chaos' face. It looks like the end, oh no, oh dear, and a Corrupted Ink Sac is required to getting here. (Why did I have to rhyme that...)

pages.title: Corrupted Basalt Deltas
pages.text: Even speaking it's name could get me killed on the spot...all I can say is getting there costs a Nether Star.
